name: k-meal-bridge
description: A delivery assistant service for foreigners in Korea

scripts.dev: npm run dev:frontend & npm run dev:backend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: npm --prefix frontend ci && npm --prefix frontend run build
scripts.build:backend: npm --prefix backend ci && npm --prefix backend run build
scripts.lint: npm --prefix frontend ci && npm --prefix frontend run lint
